    • Method Detail

      • load

        public static Bank load(java.nio.file.Path path)
                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Load bank data method. restore bank data from the bank file data.
        Parameters:
        path - bank data file path.
        Returns:
        bank inctance after restore the bank data from the bank file data.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - in case I/O bank data file failure.
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - in case serialize bank data file failure.

      • run

        public static void run()
                throws java.text.ParseException,
                       java.io.IOException,
                       java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                       java.lang.InstantiationException,
                       java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                       javax.swing.UnsupportedLookAndFeelException
        Run method. static method, check if bank file date is exists, if file exists loading data from the bank file. otherwise create new bank object with initial fortune, bank logo ,bank name, bank ID and password.
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException
        java.io.IOException - in case I/O bank data or log file failure.
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - in case serialize bank data file failure.
        java.lang.InstantiationException - Thrown when an application tries to create an instance of a class using the newInstance method in class Class, but the specified class object cannot be instantiated.
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - An IllegalAccessException is thrown when an application tries to reflectively create an instance (other than an array), set or get a field, or invoke a method, but the currently executing method does not have access to the definition of the specified class, field, method or constructor.
        javax.swing.UnsupportedLookAndFeelException - an exception that indicates the requested look & feel management classes are not present on the user's system.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main method. call static run method.
        Parameters:
        args - main args.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - in case serialize bank data file failure.
        java.lang.InstantiationException - Thrown when an application tries to create an instance of a class using the newInstance method in class Class, but the specified class object cannot be instantiated.
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - An IllegalAccessException is thrown when an application tries to reflectively create an instance (other than an array), set or get a field, or invoke a method, but the currently executing method does not have access to the definition of the specified class, field, method or constructor.
        javax.swing.UnsupportedLookAndFeelException - an exception that indicates the requested look & feel management classes are not present on the user's system.
